# Confiture v0.3.2 Release Notes

**Release Date**: November 20, 2025
**Focus**: Force flag for migrations

## Summary

This release adds support for forcing migration reapplication via the `--force` flag on the `migrate up` command.

## Key Features

### Force Flag for Migration Reapplication

Force apply migrations even when tracking shows they're already applied:

```bash
$ confiture migrate up --force
⚠️  Force mode enabled - will reapply all migrations
✅ Successfully applied 2 migration(s)!
```

### Safety Features

- Warning messages when force mode is enabled
- Confirmation prompts for production safety
- Clear documentation of force mode behavior
- Comprehensive troubleshooting guide

## Documentation

- New troubleshooting guide (`docs/guides/troubleshooting.md`)
- Updated CLI reference with `--force` documentation
- Safety warnings and best practices

## Testing

- CLI flag parsing tests
- Force logic unit tests
- Complete workflow integration tests
